key_landmarks: John Elliott (Musician): Celebrated as an influential composer and conductor, known for his orchestral works and contributions to contemporary classical music.
John Elliott (Footballer): Renowned player who left a significant mark on the sport during his time in the NFL, especially with the San Francisco 49ers.
Dr. John Elliot (Psychiatrist): Pioneer in the field of child psychiatry, known for his research and clinical work centered around autism spectrum disorders.
Sir John Elliot: English historian who played a pivotal role in shaping our understanding of British medieval history through his extensive works on Anglo-Saxon England.
John Elliott (Architect): Highly respected architect whose works focus on sustainable urban design and historic building conservation.

: John Elliot (also known as Jack Elliot, John M. Elliot, John M. Elliott and Jack Elliott) (7 May 1914 – 3 January 1972) was an American songwriter, credited with having written over 600 songs for motion pictures.

: Note: This article is about professional golfer John Elliott. There is another professional golfer named John Elliott, Jr., who was born in the mid-1940s.John Elliott (born September 5, 1963) is an American professional golfer who played on the PGA Tour and the Nationwide Tour.Elliott joined the Nationwide Tour in 1991 and didn't find much success but went through qualifying school and earned his PGA Tour card for 1992.

### Text snippet from document at k=10
: Raymond John Elliott (23 March 1929 – 22 May 2006) was a Welsh footballer who played as a centre forward in the Football League.
